metadata.description:
A Glitch in the Past Series

Process:
I wanted to make a series of classic art that was dramatically different from the usual. I have made each piece in Midjourney. The pieces have a combination of the 'Dark Divine' series that I created. Later on, I decided to add in an action to cause a glitch in the matrices of the image. The collection is a combination of beautiful and weird.

Meaning: 
I wanted to show how even the most beautiful being can have something off, weird, or unpleasant about them. Show how the world and people are truly underneath it all. This represents how even the perfection of AI can be muddled under all the code and text prompts. This builds a whole new look at classical art, technology, and the people around us.
